WASTE-WATER TREATMENT
PERSONAL CARE PRODUCTS

FULLERENE NANOPARTICLES NC(60)
ENDOCRINE-DISRUPTING COMPOUNDS

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A review of the literature published in 2012 on topics relating to the fate of emerging environmental pollutants during wastewater treatment is presented. This review is divided into the following sections: biological agents, estrogens, industrial wastewater, metals, nanomaterials, persistent organic pollutants, pharmaceuticals and personal care products, and trace organic contaminants.
